        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1984</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading strategies:Answering "What" questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert strategies:Answering ", was" fragt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture strategies:Answering "ce que" interroge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura strategies:Answering "o que" questiona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura strategies:Answering "che cosa" 
interroga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση strategies:Answering "τι" αμφισβητεί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lectura strategies:Answering "qué" pregunta</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet where the student is requred to answer "What""questions based on short texts which they first read.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">what questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt, in dem der 
Kursteilnehmer requred, um "What""questions zu beantworten ist, das 
auf kurzen Texten basiert, die sie zuerst lesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail où l'étudiant est 
requred pour répondre à "What""questions basé sur les textes courts
qu'ils lisent d'abord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho onde o estudante 
esteja requred para responder a "What""questions baseado nos textos 
curtos que lêem primeiramente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro in cui l'allievo è 
requred per rispondere "a What""questions basato sui testi corti che 
in primo luogo leggono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου ο σπουδαστής 
είναι για να απαντήσει "σε What""questions βασισμένο στα κοντά 
κείμενα που διάβασαν αρχικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo donde está el 
estudiante requred para contestar a "What""questions basado en los 
textos cortos que primero leen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
